pages.text: $(li)Deep Cold Ocean is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/cold_ocean)Cold Ocean$(/l) that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The terrain of this place is composed mostly of Gravel blocks. $(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass and Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals can survive these harsh conditions like Salmons, Cods, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/frilled_shark)Frilled Sharks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whales$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/thrasher)Thrashers$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Deep Cold Ocean$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
